attributes.action: Help keep female health products on the shelf and make then free
attributes.additional_details: Its unfair that females have to buy there health products when its not a choice to have periods whereas men can get condoms for free when sex is a choice
attributes.background: The government need to make female health products like tampons and sanitary towels and the shelf and make the free to buy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
